name: St. Dominic Hospital - Bariatric Surgery
description: St. Dominic Health Services is a Catholic healthcare system that offers bariatric surgery solutions as part of its comprehensive weight loss program. They provide both surgical and non-surgical options
services: Catholic-owned Bariatric surgery in Mississippi consultation

name: Merit Health Wesley - Bariatric Weight Loss Surgery
description: Merit Health Wesley's bariatric surgery program is accredited by the Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery Accreditation and Quality Improvement Program (MBSAQIP). They offer a multidisciplinary approach to weight loss surgery
services: Catholic-owned Bariatric surgery in Mississippi consultation

name: University of Mississippi Medical Center (UMMC) - Bariatric Surgery
description: UMMC offers a comprehensive bariatric surgery program accredited by the American College of Surgeons and the American Society for Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery. While not exclusively Catholic, it is a major medical center in Mississippi providing these services
services: Catholic-owned Bariatric surgery in Mississippi consultation

name: North Mississippi Medical Center (NMMC) - Bariatric Center
description: NMMC's Bariatric Center is accredited as a Comprehensive Center by the Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery Accreditation and Quality Improvement Program (MBSAQIP). They offer various surgical procedures for weight loss
services: Catholic-owned Bariatric surgery in Mississippi consultation

name: Singing River Health System - Bariatric Surgery
description: Singing River Health System offers bariatric surgery as part of its comprehensive surgical services, utilizing advanced technology and experienced surgeons
services: Catholic-owned Bariatric surgery in Mississippi consultation
